snippet: The officer was shot to death after opening fire at a training center in eastern Amman, the Jordanian capital. The motive was not immediately clear.
abstract: Jordanian policeman is fatally shot after killing five people, two of them American trainers, at United States-backed security training facility in Amman; officials refrain from announcing motive, but some suspect infiltration by anti-American militants.

byline.original: By RANA F. SWEIS and DAN BILEFSKY
byline.contributor: Rana F. Sweis reported from Amman, and Dan Bilefsky from London. Reporting was contributed by Eric Schmitt and Julie Hirschfeld Davis from Washington; Michael R. Gordon from Erbil, Iraq; Diaa Hadid from Ramallah, West Bank; and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: The officer was shot to death after opening fire at a training center in eastern Amman, the Jordanian capital. The motive was not immediately clear.

headline.main: Jordanian Police Officer Kills Five, Including Two Americans
headline.print_headline: Jordanian Officer Kills Five, Including Two Americans, at Training Base
